mapper.select:
select
from tbl_academic a join tbl_user u1 on a.stu_id = u1.id join tbl_user u2 on a.create_by = u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on a.edit_by = u3.id
and a.academic_name like '%' #{academicName} '%'
and a.stu_id like '%' #{stuId} '%'
and u1.name like '%' #{stuName} '%'
and a.periodical like '%' #{periodical} '%'
and a.published_time = #{publishedTime}
order by a.create_time desc limit #{beginNo}, #{pageSize}

and a.published_time = #{publishedTime}
